deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

getSellInfo(uint128,uint128,uint256,uint.details: See {ICurve-getSellInfo} If newSpotPrice is less than MIN_PRICE, newSpotPrice is set to MIN_PRICE instead. This is to prevent the spot price from ever becoming 0, which would decouple the price from the bonding curve (since 0 * delta is still 0)
